name: MBCC Group
description: MBCC Group is a leading global provider of construction chemicals and solutions, committed to enhancing the sustainability and performance of buildings and infrastructure. Established as a spin-off from BASF's construction chemicals division, MBCC focuses on delivering innovative products that support the construction industry in meeting modern demands for durability, efficiency, and environmental responsibility. The company offers a wide range of solutions including concrete admixtures, surface treatment products, and repair and protection systems. By leveraging advanced technology and extensive industry expertise, MBCC aims to address the challenges of urbanization and climate change while providing high-performance solutions for both new construction and renovation projects. With a strong presence in Europe, Asia, and the Americas, MBCC is dedicated to fostering long-term partnerships with its clients and contributing to sustainable construction practices. The company's mission is to enable the construction industry to build better, ensuring that structures are not only robust but also environmentally friendly and cost-effective. MBCC's commitment to innovation and sustainability is reflected in its continuous investment in research and development, as well as in its efforts to reduce the carbon footprint of its products and operations.
